meanings.definition: Sleep longer than intended or necessary.
meanings.sent1: I always oversleep on weekends and wake up late.
meanings.sent2: Don't oversleep tomorrow or you'll miss the bus.
meanings.sent3: I tend to oversleep when I stay up too late watching movies.
meanings.sent4: She overslept through the alarm, missing her morning meeting.
meanings.sent5: If you oversleep, you might feel groggy and tired all day.

meanings.definition: To sleep beyond the usual or proper time for waking.
meanings.sent1: Sometimes I oversleep and miss my morning workout.
meanings.sent2: If you oversleep, you might feel rushed in the morning.
meanings.sent3: I overslept so much that I missed breakfast and lunch!
meanings.sent4: He tends to oversleep when he's stressed out about work.
meanings.sent5: Oversleeping can mess up your sleep schedule for the whole week.
